original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kabaḷāvacchedakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kabaḷāvacchedakam bhuñjanti pe
na kabaḷa avacchedakam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca kabaḷāvacchedakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca kabaḷāvacchedakam bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
